job.body:
Total vacancies:

Name of the Vacancies:

  • RAS/ RTS Combined Competitive Exam 2021 

Description

Latest Central Government Jobs for Graduates have been published by Rajasthan Public Service Commission for RAS/ RTS vacancies in Rajasthan. If you are searching for a government job in Rajasthan then it is an opportunity for you. You can fill the online application for the vacancies of RAS/ RTS, from 04-08-2021, and till 02-09-2021. If you are interested in all these vacancies in Rajasthan and if eligible, please check out the details given below, which have been given age limit, educational qualification pay scale, etc.

Application fee:

  • The mode of application is Online
  • No information about the application fee.

Educational qualification:

  • To apply for a RAS/ RTS in RPSC, your Graduation must be completed from a recognized University

Important dates:

  •  The starting date to apply in these posts is 04-08-2021 
  •  The last date to apply in these posts is 02-09-2021 till 12:00 midnight

Age Limit Criteria:

  • For General Candidate, you should be between 21 to 35 years old. 

RPSC RAS/ RTS Pay Scale:

  • According to the information given by the Central Government and as per the 7th pay commission, the teacher's monthly salary is as per norms

How to apply for RPSC RAS/ RTS Recruitment 2021?

Press the Apply Now button above. You can directly and easily start the application process of the RAS/ RTS. Fill in your details and submit it or follow all the steps given below.

  •  First, go to the official website of RPSC and register yourself on the portal.
  • Find the notification, log in and then provide the details and documents asked by RPSC
  • Then save it and complete the application submission.
  • Then to fully complete the process you have to submit the application fee.
  • And finally, download the application form for future purposes.

Download Official notification pdf.
